data.title: Slowcooked Curry
data.summary: A very tasty curry slowcooked all day
data.contents:
Ingredients

  • 1 tbsp sunflower oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 3 garlic cloves
  • 1 tsp ground cumin
  • 1 tsp ground coriander
  • 1 1/2 tbsp garam masala
  • 1 - 3 tsp hot paprika
  • 2 tbsp tomato puree
  • 2 1/2 cm fresh root ginger, peeled and grated
  • 400g tin chopped tomatos
  • 200ml coconut milk
  • 1tsp caster sugar
  • 650g chicken fillets
  • handful fresh coriander leaves

Instructions

Bang it all in the slow cooker
